channel.title: How do i do this?

item.title: How do i do this?
item.dc:creator: @Stanyer Stanyer
item.description:
@Stanyer wrote:

I have this:

public int ReturnDefBonus(int PlayerID){
client x = (client) server.playerHandler.players[PlayerID];
/*
There's more coding here, just didn't want to leak my def bonus method
*/
int FinalDef = MeanDef/20;
if(FinalDef < 1){
return 1;
}
return FinalDef;
}

But sometimes that result is less than 1, for example it might be 0.543

I tryed adding the

if(FinalDef < 1){
return 1;
}

But it still doesn’t always work… HALP

Read full topic
